13.title: Changelog
13.body:
Modded by tieren

Card, token and unofficial rules are from the following people:
JD: https://www.patreon.com/theJDfiles
GryffinDuVerd: https://www.reddit.com/r/SWlegion/comments/73uvaj/sw_legion_demoplaytest_toolkit/
Eternal3lade papercraft: https://www.reddit.com/r/SWlegion/comments/6vtlyb/star_wars_legion_papercraft_models_complete/
Models from Nickschumann's Imperial Assault models
3D Terrain from ShotbyScott: https://www.thingiverse.com/shotbyscott
3D Terrain from Imperial Terrain
www.imperialterrain.com

CHANGELOG

12 Oct 2017:
        Added scripting for movement templates.
        Uploaded custom bases
        Added 90 degree limit for movement templates
        Optimized models and textures
        Added Color for Speeder Bike Model

13 Oct 2017
        Added new map: Endor Moon Station!

17 Oct 2017
Brand New controller system:
        Players can now control their units via the control system from the respective unit command tokens
        
        Press the green button on the command tokens to access Action options.
                - Move action spawns movement templates which can change speed.
                - Height button increases the height of the template to allow you to go over elevated terrain
                - Unit leaders in squads will spawn a range radius for cohesion
        Next button allows you to change unit selection if more than one eligible units are available.
        Bases will be highlighted red on unit selection
        Aim, Dodge and Overwatch buttons takes the corresponding token and sets it down
        Atk Button allows you to spawn range rulers and draw corresponding D8 Die for attack.
        End button to end turn.

        Movement templates now have snap points at the end of the template to allow units to move precisely to the end.


19 Oct 2017
        Bugfixes
        Combined Models and bases, changed scale of units to be slightly smaller
        Mini bases will change color depending on map
        Added end turn options to automate token return
        Added 3D versions of tokens made by GryffinDuVerd link: https://www.thingiverse.com/thing:2564588
        Modified Endor Moon Base Map

20 Oct 2017
        Bug Fixes
        Added Add Suppression button to Attack options in game controller

31 Oct 2017
        Redid Movement Templates
        Imported New T-47 Airspeeder and AT-ST Models
        Reimported sharpened Cards

1 Nov 2017
        Added auto spawn dice Trays when rolling attack or defence die

10 Nov 2017
        Add Army Spawner System
        Added Color Side System. Players can play same factions against each other now.
        Updated Command Tokens Colors
        New Stormtrooper Leader Model
        New Map: Lars Moisture Farm. Perfect for intro games

18 Nov 2017
        Bugfixes

19 Nov 2017
        New Tokens uploaded

22 Nov 2017
        Timer Bugfixes

27 Nov 2017
        New Die Roller
        New Tatooine terrain by www.imperialterrain.com

3 Dec 2017
        New terrain in Mos Eisley Map by www.imperialterrain.com

6 Dec 2017
        Added rider for AT-RT

19 Dec 2017
        New Map: Rebel Hoth base
        Added Reverse movement on Vehicles

29 Dec 2017
        Added Squad Numbers for duplicate units
        Added Mod load counter

20 Jan  2018
        Added General Veers Cards and Models
        Added Snowtroopers Cards and Models
        Added Squad Numbers on Unit Cards
        Added High Res Vehicle Damage Tokens
        Fixed Movement Template Bugs
        Unit Leaders now spawn with unit upgrades in its description.

31 Jan 2018
        Added Fleet Troopers Cards and Models
        Added Leia Organa Cards and Models
        Updated some cards with higher quality pictures from FFG website

3 Jan 2018
        Added New Rebel Troopers Models with custom poses
        Added New Stormtroopers Models with custom Poses

7 Feb
        Bug Fixes

8 Feb
        Added New 74-Z Speeder Bike Models
        Bug Fixes

10 Feb
        Added New AT-RT Models

17 Feb
        Changed Range Ruler to measure from base instead of center. 
        Uploaded Learn to Play Rules

        Renamed Overwatch tokens to Standby Tokens. Standby Tokens are now removed at end of round with Remove Tokens button

27 Feb
        Resized Bases to correct sizes.

        New Models for Luke, Vader, Fleet Troopers and Snowtroopers

        Uploaded Official Learn to Play Rules
        Uploaded Rules Reference

13 March
        New Army Listbuilder
        Added Save Army to Data Disk functionality
        Added Load Army from Data Disk functionality
        Updated Army list Builder Menu with new skin
        Army List Builder Menu now supports up to 7 upgrades per unit

18 March
        New Map System
        New Pre-made Maps Mos Eisley and Hoth Fortress
        New Custom Maps sytem
        New Custom Maps Volcano and Beach

        New Save Map functionality. Create your own maps from Custom Maps and save it to data disk
        New Load map functionality. Save ur maps to data cartridges and load it with the map loader

25 March
        New Setup system
        Spawns tokens based on objective or condition
        Spawns map overlay
        Fixed veers points
        Added priority supplies setupcards

27 March
        New Guided Setup function
        - Helps players setup a tournament or standard game

        New player color switch function

        New Define Battlefield function
        - Automatically draws battlefield cards

        Tokens now highlight a mini instead of tinting a mini. Doesn't screw up custom color tints now. 

        Added Spawn range ruler function to tokens outside of the attack menu

5 April
	Do starter game spawner. 
	remove range rulers. script. 
	delete everything in die roller
	Put in new deployment cards
	Auto debug
	Game options set up
	Debug button.  - wrong scale map loading. Do slow loading?
	Change cohesion and range ruler collider. 
	Add option to remove stuck cohesion/range/movement templates. 
	fix scarif
	sullust map
	add lock physics note
	Finish hoth and sullust map
	remove the center map rock
	leaders keep tint when reload
	Fix walls descriptions
	Fix wall model

10 april
fix demote bug
debug conditions spawn.
Screen cards debug 
debug define battlefield
change cohesion ruler color
debug switch color stuff. 
cards number
define battlefield bug.

16 April
- Bugfixes
- Activating your unit now highlights each mini Green
- Using the range ruler will now highlight all enemy units in distinct colors

6 May
New Token System
- New token tray
- Shuffle/stack/split functionality
- Added Special forces tokens
- Recolored and Rearranged Token buttons

Competitive Placement Maps
- Spawns quarter board worth of terrain.
- Available in guided setup and under map options

New Units and Cards
- Added all spoiled Han Solo, Rebel Troopers, Veers and Snowtroopers cards and models.
- Snowtroopers are now the correct 48 points

Tweaked Data Disks
- Now compatible with new special forces units.
- Please remake your data disks

New Turn Counter

10 May
Tweaked Movement Templates
- Removed Snap points at end of movement templates.
- Added an Execute Full Move and Return to Start Position button on move menus in the Command Tokens.
- Resized move templates to be super accurate now.

1 July
New Attack Button Function
- Attack and range Command token function adds Range display over enemy units

- Attack button creates attack mode which draws attack lines to enemy models. 

- Attack mode spawns buttons which adds suppression, wound and ion tokens

14 JULY
New Palpatine and Imperial Royal Guards Added!

23 July 
New Map: Tarkin Town


2 August
Added Deck Builder!
- Customize your Battle Deck and Command Hand when list building.
- Correctly spawns command cards if more than 2 Commander or Operatives

Added Immobilize Tokens

Added 10 more List Builder templates

Added Define Battlefield from Battle Deck function

Table will not disappear anymore. EVER. (I hope)

Bug Fixes

Added Camera Shortcuts
Shift + 1: Red Player Die Roller
Shift + 2: Red Player Battlefield
Shift + 3: Blue Player Die Roller
Shift + 4: Blue Player Battlefield

7 August
Added New units and their upgrades!
- Imperial Officer
- Rebel Officer
- Chewbacca
- Wookie Warriors
- Rebel Sniper and Saboteur

Added Proton Charge tokens
- Flip the token to change color

8 August
Added New Map Coruscant Slums

6 September
Added new tourney maps:
Mimban Trenches
Kachirho Beach
Bespin Gardens

Moved Coruscant and Tarkin Town map to Tourney map

Added disco lights to Couscant map

Updated Terrain Descriptions for Tourney Maps
Added Command Token Bag
- You can pull command tokens from the bag if you accidentally delete your token

Added Boba 3 pip Command card

Change Chewbacca points from 80 to 110

Fixed Bugs

10 Oct
New Invader League Tournament maps
- Bespin Plaza
- Mimban Camp Forward
- Coruscant Port
- Lothal City
- Kashyyyk Jungle


13 Nov
New Invader League Map
- Jedha Town Square

29 Nov
Added cards:
Fragmentation Grenade
Recon Intel
Give in to your Anger Command card

Updated:
Key Positions
Rapid Reinforcements

29 Dec
Krennic, Death Troopers, Jyn and Pathfinders models and cards added

22 Jan
added new custom texture map function

31 Jan
New Imperial and Rebel Specialist cards and models added!

X-34 Landspeeder Model and Cards added.

Imperial Tank coming soon!

8 Feb
Bossk and Sabine models and cards added!

Rest of Jyn command cards added
